attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our system of government is a system which has been imposed on the people of this country and which was constitued without any contribution from the ordinary citizen, simply because it was designed for the benefit of the historically powerful establishment and the monied classes. 
Our current system does not serve the needs of the people efficiently or effectively and is completely anachronistic, allowing the ruling establishments a free reign in every walk of life and the the people to be managed rather than represented.
Both Houses of Parliament and the ways in which they operate are in need of reform. They need to be modernised to reflect the wishes of the people.
